issue.title: [C++] thrift_ep 0.12.0 fails to build when using ARROW_BOOST_VENDORED=ON
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I discovered this when working on ARROW-4343 (Ubuntu 14.04 build, where the system Boost is unsupported).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5617?focusedCommentId=16865935) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
